text: mariyu (parasparam ila ceppukuntaru): "Mi dharmanni anusarince varini tappa marevvarini nam'makandi." (O pravakta!) Nivu varito anu: "Niscayanga, allah margadarsakatvame saraina margadarsakatvam." (Varu inka ila antaru): "Miku ivvabadinatuvantidi inkevarikaina ivvabadutundani, leka varu mi prabhuvu samaksanlo mito vadistarani, (nam'makandi)." Varito anu: "Niscayanga, anugraham allah cetilone undi; ayana danini tanu korina variki prasadistadu. Mariyu allah sarvavyapti, sarvajnudu
